resources.string: \tSelect any BT devices as triggers to enable WiFi Hotspot.\nIf any of selected devices connects to your device the WiFi Hotspot is activated.
\tNo active Bluetooth device found. Please, turn it on.
HotSpotInCar application failed due to undocumented feature error
Android 6.0+ requires you to manually activate permissions.\nIf you aggree press \'Yes\' and activate it on the next screen.
